019
020import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
021import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
022
023import java.math.BigDecimal;
024
025import static net.tnemc.core.TNECore.DEFAULT_WORLD;
026
027/**
028 * ParseMoney
029 *
030 * @author creatorfromhell
031 * @since 0.1.4.0
032 */
033public class ParseMoney {
034
035  private String region;
036  private BigDecimal amount;
037  private Currency currency;
038
039  public ParseMoney(final String region) {
040
041    this(region, TNECore.eco().currency().defaultCurrency(region));
042  }
043
044  public ParseMoney(final String region, final Currency currency) {
045
046    this.region = region;
047    this.amount = BigDecimal.ZERO;
048    this.currency = currency;
049  }
050
051  public void normalizeParameters(final Currency currency, final String region) {
052
053    if(currency != null) {
054      this.currency = currency;
055    }
056
057    if(!region.equalsIgnoreCase(DEFAULT_WORLD)) {
058      this.region = region;
059    }
060  }
061
062  public String region() {
063
064    return region;
065  }
066
067  public void region(final String region) {
068    this.region = region;
069  }
070
071  public BigDecimal amount() {
072
073    return amount;
074  }
075
076  public void amount(final BigDecimal amount) {
077
078    this.amount = amount;
079  }
080
081  public Currency currency() {
082
083    return currency;
084  }
085
086  public void currency(final Currency currency) {
087
088    this.currency = currency;
089  }
090
091  public boolean hasCurrency() {
092
093    return currency != null;
094  }
095
096  @Override
097  public String toString() {
098
099    return "ParseMoney{" +
100           "region='" + region + '\'' +
101           ", amount=" + amount +
102           ", currency=" + currency +
103           '}';
104  }
105}
